name: Sunite Ore
description: Legendary Sunite, I should try smithing this into a bar.

name: Glorite Ore
description: A gently pulsating crystal of Glorite ore, it seems to neither reflect nor absorb any light. What could you possibly do with this?

name: Elven Steel Ore
description:
A rare form of iron ore found only in the land of Nel'Vari. Due to a ban on fire crystals, no one in the forest city is sure how to smelt it into bars.

In ancient Nel'Varian the word "steel" roughly translates to "hard as dragon".

name: Enhanced Mithril Bar
description: A mithril bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enhanced Sunite Bar
description: A sunite bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enhanced Glorite Bar
description: A glorite bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enchanted Mithril Bar
description: A mithril bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Enchanted Sunite Bar
description: A sunite bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Enchanted Glorite Bar
description: A glorite bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Sunite Bar
description: A bar of refined sunite, this will produce equipment of legendary quality.

name: Glorite Bar
description: A bar of Glorite, ready to be turned into something legendary.

name: Elven Steel Bar
description:
Peerless and naturally enchanted steel, it shimmers in the light like a mirror.

"The Nel'Varians lost the technique of forging ore into steel, but why did they learn it in the first place?"

name: Cobble Stone Bridge
description: A sturdy cobble stone bridge for your farm.

name: Stone Bridge
description: A sturdy stone bridge for your farm.

name: Wood Bridge
description: A sturdy wooden bridge for your farm.

name: Arched Bridge
description: A sturdy arched bridge for your farm.

name: Marble Bridge
description: A sturdy marble bridge for your farm.

name: Elven Bridge
description: A bridge crafted in the Elven style for your farm.

name: Spring Bridge
description: A bridge crafted with a springtime flair for your farm.

name: Monster Bridge
description: A bridge crafted in the Monsterfolk style for your farm.

name: Modern Bridge
description: A bridge crafted in a modern style for your farm.

name: Zen Bridge
description: A bridge crafted after the zen style of the lands across the eastern sea, for your farm.

name: Toy Bridge
description: Every child's dream bridge! Crafted just for your farm.

name: Soul Orb Jam
description: Faintly glowing jam made from soul orbs, plenty of sparkling dust and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a massive boost to your farming and fishing skills.

name: Golden Pomegranate Jam
description: Golden jam made from golden pomegranates and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your exploration and farming skills.

name: Persian Love Cake
description: Old legends tell of a maiden who fell in love with a prince, and so she made him this cake. It's probably just a story, but the cake sure does taste great!

name: Cheesecake Ice Cream
description: Can't choose between having cheesecake or ice cream? Now you don't have to!

name: Legendary Fish Bait
description: Sun Haven's secret treasure, fishing bait of legendary potency.

name: Advanced Magic Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of water, significantly increasing your crop's chance to stay watered over night.

name: Amulet of Immortality
description: A delicate amulet hanging by a thin golden chain, it preserves the life of its wearer. Increases the invulnerability period by 25% after taking damage.

name: Gold Record Player
description: I can play musical records with this. Music players never looked so illustrious!

name: Golden Tree Seeds
description: A seed of pure gold. If planted, it will grow a golden tree. The golden tree, of course, will produce many golden items.

name: Melon
description: Soft, ripe and perfect for a hot summer day.

name: Durian
description: This fruit stinks! Literally!

name: Pythagorean Berry
description: Forget trying to pronounce the name. Just eat the fruit!

name: Soul Fizz
description: It fizzes with a sickly glow, but it tastes yummy!

name: Soul Orb Seeds
description: A pale white seed that softly hums with a strange energy.

name: Dragon Fruit Seeds
description: Large and covered in soft green thorns, these seeds radiate a warmth you can feel even through the bag.

name: Mana Gem Seeds
description: Tiny gems of crystalized mana, these "seeds" can only be grown by Nivara's best students.

name: Melon Seeds
description: They're little seeds now, but plant them and they'll grow into mighty melons.

name: Durian Seeds
description: Are you hurryin' to plant your durian?

name: Pythagorean Berry Seeds
description: Math nerds love these triangular seeds.

name: Lantern Spirit
description: With an affinity for taking care of plants, this little dragon has a chance to water some of your crops when left on your farm over night!

name: Royal Herring
description: All hail the royal highness of the ocean!

name: Chromafin
description: Legends tell of a fish, said to have descended from the rainbows above, whose chromatic scales endlessly shift and change color.

name: Golden Carp
description: Sailors across the oceans trade stories of a vibrantly shining carp, swimming through the waves like a living piece of gold.

name: Shadow Tuna
description: The eggs of this shadowy fish are a favorite delicacy of Withergate's upper class.

name: Crystal Tetra
description: A hardy fish covered with gemstone scales that twinkle in the light.

name: Sky Ray
description: Named for the way it glides swiftly through the water, as if flying through the sky.

name: Gold Boot
description: A boot of solid gold! One man's treasure is another man's... treasure?

name: Angelfin
description: Gliding through the waters with an unmatchable angelic grace, all it's missing is a chorus of trumpets.

name: Bubblefish
description: A mythical elemental fish that is impossible to see in the water. Angling this would truly be a feat worthy of songs.

name: Albino Squid
description: Hushed whispers in King Minos's court trade rumors of a tentacled squid, said to be as pale and reflective as the moon itself.

name: Devilfin
description: Fishermen in Withergate go about their work in constant fear that they may be unlucky enough to meet the Devilfin on the end of their line.

name: Christmas Lightfish
description: People of the Southern Isles have the oddest tradition of topping their holiday trees with this festive fish.

name: Jingle Bass
description: It jingles just like a bell! It also LOOKS just like a bell...

name: Hearth Angler
description: Its lure light not only draws prey in, but also helps cook it to a delicious crisp.

name: Pyrelus
description: Native to the Magma Isles, this nautilus migrates north in the summer season to search for fresh prey.

name: Neon Tetra
description: A bold tetra fish whose striking neon colors pose not as a warning to potential predators - but a challenge!

name: Coducopia
description: Hey, this would look great in a cornucopia.

name: King Salmon
description: Please unhook his royal highness, ye base and most uncouth farmer.

name: Peach Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful peach tree once planted.

name: Festive Orange Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful orange tree once planted.

name: Legendary Fish
description: Any legendary fish
